E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 6/19/1978
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 6/23/1978
Subject: Dewey Robinson healing process
Dewey Robinson is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/23/1978
Subject: Progress of John Harris
Dear Sir,
John Harris is hitting the ball well at A Miami Orioles!
He has an AVG of .299, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Joe Keough

Subject: Extension?

Mickey Scott

a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
